question.text: You’re on a two-lane dual carriageway. Why would you use the right-hand lane?

explanation.text: Normally you should travel in the left-hand lane and only use the right-hand lane for overtaking or turning right. Move back into the left lane as soon as it’s safe but don’t cut in across the path of the vehicle you’ve just passed.

answer.text: When staying at the minimum allowed speed
To keep driving at a constant high speed
